import React from 'react' import Product from '../components/Product' export default function ProductScreen() { const product = data.products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); if(!product){ return
Product Not Found
; } return (

  • {product.name}

  • Price : ₹{product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ₹{product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock}
) }
